lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The European Parliament is also expected to refuse an early debate on the changeover in the farm payments system, further delaying any moves to solve the deficit problem, parliamentary sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The EC executive Commission says the Community faces a deficit this year of at least five billion European Currency Units and could be forced to choose between massive spending cuts or bankruptcy.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But poorer member states, which would have to borrow funds to cover the delay, complain the change in the system would unfairly impose too much of the burden on them.
